articles.title: Alabama tops preseason USA Today coaches' poll followed by Ohio State, Georgia
articles.description: Alabama was voted No. 1 in the preseason USA Today coaches' poll released Monday, with Ohio State second and defending national champion Georgia third.
articles.content:
Alabama was voted No. 1 in the preseason USA Today coaches' poll released Monday, with Ohio State second and defending national champion Georgia third.

articles.title: Las Vegas Raiders coach Josh McDaniels ends speculation over potential Josh Jacobs trade
articles.description: Raiders first-year coach Josh McDaniels put an end to speculation Monday that former Pro Bowl running back Josh Jacobs was being showcased for a possible trade by playing so many snaps in the team's preseason opener.

articles.author: Jamison HensleyESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Baltimore Ravens sign K Justin Tucker to four-year extension
articles.description: The Ravens have announced the signing of kicker Justin Tucker to a four-year extension. Tucker, the most accurate kicker in NFL history, will continue to be the highest-paid one in the league, according to a source.
articles.content:
OWINGS MILLS, Md. -- Justin Tucker signed a four-year extension with the Baltimore Ravens on Monday that, a source said, will keep him as the NFL's highest-paid kicker.
Tucker, the most accurate kic… [+490 chars]

articles.title: Hall of Famer Dennis Eckersley leaving Boston Red Sox booth after 2022, his 50th season in MLB
articles.description: Hall of Fame pitcher Dennis Eckersley said Monday that he will be leaving NESN broadcasts at the end of the 2022 season, his 50th in major league baseball.
articles.content:
BOSTON -- Hall of Fame pitcher Dennis Eckersley said Monday he will be leaving the Boston Red Sox broadcasts at the end of the season, his 50th in major league baseball.

articles.title: PGA Tour files motion in federal court to keep three LIV golfers out of FedEx Cup Playoffs

articles.title: Longtime Oklahoma Sooners football assistant Cale Gundy resigns after reading aloud 'shameful' word off player's iPad
